channel.title: Tutorials on Coco Server
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorials on Coco Server

item.title: How to integrate Coco AI with your own datasource
item.description: How to integrate Coco AI with your own datasource # This guide will walk you through the process of creating a custom datasource and building a simple connector to integrate it with the system. Obtain API Token # Make sure you have a valid API token before continue. Create a simple connector # curl -H'X-API-TOKEN: cv9bb63q50k5eikkq43gp07lmg60gn2nor7uf650xpxazd6a6nns8uttymz52uvnplhmtaf829x71lph51li' -XPOST http://localhost:9000/connector/ -d'{ "name": "My Connector" }' Response { "_id": "cv9bc23q50k5eikkq4c0", "result": "created" } Create a datasource for this connector # curl -H'X-API-TOKEN: cv9bb63q50k5eikkq43gp07lmg60gn2nor7uf650xpxazd6a6nns8uttymz52uvnplhmtaf829x71lph51li' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -XPOST http://localhost:9000/datasource/ -d' { "name":"My Datasource", "type":"connector", "connector":{ "id":"cv9bc23q50k5eikkq4c0" } }' Response
